CustomField.description: Time spent in minutes in Patient Call Back
CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Patient Call Back"), ROUND(((NOW() - TUC_Status_Change_Time_Holder__c )*1440),0), TUC_Total_Time_in_Patient_Call_Back__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time spent in minutes in Patient Call Back
CustomField.label: Time Spent in Patient Call Back
